item.title: Amazon AMS
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Work in progress, portion of customers may still be vulnerable. Actively monitoring this issue, and are working on addressing it for any AMS services which use Log4j2 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon API Gateway
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL All hosts now patched Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 15:05:44 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS
item.description: Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Notes: Amazon Linux 1 had aws apitools which were Java based but these were deprecated in 2015 AWS Forum. AMIs used to inspect and verify (base spin ups) - amzn-ami-hvm-2018.03.0.20200318.1-x86_64-gp2 and amzn2-ami-kernel-5.10-hvm-2.0.20211201.0-x86_64-gp2 CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 5:43:39 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS CloudHSM
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j2 Security Bulletin (CVE-2021-44228) (amazon.com) https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-005/ Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CloudHSM JCE SDK 3.4.1 or higher is not vulnerable Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon AWS Directory Service
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Updated to mitigate the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS Elastic Beanstalk
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Default configuration of application’s usage of Log4j versions is not vulnerable Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS Glue
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Has been updated. Vulnerable only if ETL jobs load affected versions of Apache Log4j Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS Greengrass
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Updates for all Greengrass V2 components Stream Manager (2.0.14) and Secure Tunneling (1.0.6) are available. For Greengrass versions 1.10.x and 1.11.x, an update for the Stream Manager feature is included in Greengrass patch versions 1.10.5 and 1.11.5 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon AWS IoT SiteWise Edge
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Updates for all AWS IoT SiteWise Edge components that use Log4j were made available; OPC-UA collector (v2.0.3), Data processing pack (v2.0.14), and Publisher (v2.0.2) Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon AWS KMS
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL AWS KMS has been updated to mitigate the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon AWS Lambda
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j2 Security Bulletin (CVE-2021-44228) (amazon.com) https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-005/ Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Vulnerable when using aws-lambda-java-log4j2 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-14 15:24:48 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.
